metadata.Title: CVE-2021-44541 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
A vulnerability was found in Privoxy which was fixed inprocess_encrypted_request_headers() by freeing header memory when failingto get the request destination.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-44541` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

privoxy - 3.0.33-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: privoxy package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.33-1').
